last_episode_to_air.name: Love in the Stars
last_episode_to_air.overview: The remaining couples leave the compound to shop for their wedding wardrobe and cut loose at bachelor and bachelorette parties. Last minute doubts shake several of the betrothed, as they realize the true weight of their upcoming decision. Then, each couple makes their final decision at the altar… will they say “I do” and embrace their Cosmic Love or walk away from their romantic destiny?

name: Cosmic Love
overview: In this one-of-a-kind social experiment, four individuals attempt to find their perfect spouse via astrological matchmaking. Their romantic adventure takes place at a retreat run by a mystical guide, the Astro Chamber. They mingle, match, date, eliminate, and eventually make the biggest decision of their lives… will they marry their match based solely on their astrological compatibility?
tagline: Is their love story written in the stars?

episodes.name: Astrologically Matched
episodes.overview: The four Elements arrive at the Cosmic Compound and meet a group of eligible singles. They each go on a first date before any of their ideal matches are revealed; some follow their astrological advice, and some fall back into old patterns. Sparks begin to fly and early connections are tested when each Element has their first match revealed.

episodes.name: Must Be a Full Moon
episodes.overview: Things get messy as the Elements forge new bonds during a group activity. Maria struggles to follow the advice of the Astro Chamber, and the pressure of the experiment begins to overwhelm firefighter Connor. Each Element discovers another one of their matches and then tempers flare at a beach party when Phoebe finds out she’s been misled.

episodes.name: Mercury Is Totes in Retrograde
episodes.overview: The Astro Chamber continues to deliver guidance while other connections in the compound cause some of the Elements to rethink their matches. Noel deals with balancing his many connections, while Phoebe looks for at least one. Maria gets upsetting news but then bounces back when an unexpected match is revealed and takes her by surprise.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Chris's
episodes.overview: Phoebe dishes out some hard truths which leads to a confrontation with Phil, while one of Maria’s matches makes a push for her attention. Then, with tensions already high, the Elements find out their fourth and final matches. Not everyone at the Cosmic Compound is happy with who is matched with who, especially Chris R.

episodes.name: Total Eclipse of the Heart
episodes.overview: Now that the elements know all four of their matches, they get a chance to know them even better… on a group date. Phoebe lets her matches know that romance is back on the table, before the Astro Chamber drops a bombshell that leaves all of the Elements reeling.

episodes.name: Scorpio Season
episodes.overview: Maria makes her decision and the entire compound is left in shock. Noel and Maria take their relationships to the next level, while Connor continues to be stuck in first gear. A group activity triggers a surprising emotional moment, and Phoebe makes a last-ditch attempt to take the Astro Chamber’s advice but is blindsided by betrayal.

episodes.name: Proposals of Astronomical Proportions
episodes.overview: It’s time for the Elements to decide which of their matches they want to get engaged to, but first they are surprised by a new presence in the Astro Chamber. As proposals loom, Noel's connection with his newest match continues to grow, Maria considers her options, and Connor faces his biggest fear… having to make a monumental decision?

episodes.name: Charting a Future Together
episodes.overview: The final proposals lead to more dramatic moments, and then the remaining Elements help their fiancés move in with them. As the adrenaline rush of the engagements fades, the Elements and their partners wrestle with the reality of their situation, how well they really know each other, and what they want out of their recently established relationships.

episodes.name: A Cosmic Guide to Meeting Your In-Laws
episodes.overview: With weddings looming it’s time for the Elements and their fiancés to meet each other’s families. The Astro Chamber doles out advice on how to make the best first impression, but will Astrology be enough to convince their future in-laws that they are ready for marriage? In the final hour, Connor has to make his decision.

episodes.name: Love in the Stars
episodes.overview: The remaining couples leave the compound to shop for their wedding wardrobe and cut loose at bachelor and bachelorette parties. Last minute doubts shake several of the betrothed, as they realize the true weight of their upcoming decision. Then, each couple makes their final decision at the altar… will they say “I do” and embrace their Cosmic Love or walk away from their romantic destiny?
